title: Only Love
summary:
"Only you are special."

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile. But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?!

title: Which Wizard Will Kill Me
summary: Life at Papilon, the elite magic school, is full of hardships for Rhea who's failing in every possible way. One day, when her hidden friendship with the top-student and her childhood friend Sion gets discovered by the mysterious transfer student, Joon, Rhea can’t help but notice the energy of death surrounding him… Who will be the wizard to kill her?!

title: Kissing Is a Violation of Contract
summary:
"Be my girlfriend."
Jae-hyun, a selfish tycoon, and Dan-bi, who has nothing but confidence to rely on.
They are entangled in a rainbow(?) relationship!
Will this 'contractual love affair' end safely?

title: Tiger Cub
summary:
The kid next door came back as an adult. What he is aiming for.. is my ♡♡..?!

Choi In-ho, the kid next door who took care of him when he was young, appears in the basement of this ordinary office worker. Due to In-ho's fraud (?), he suddenly ends up living in the basement.

Inho, who has been in love with the kid since his childhood, tries to seduce him, but fails once and for all..

What do we do to flirt with this dull brother?!

title: The Almighty Daughter Runs The World
summary:
After traveling through time and space, Ye Zhuo became a fake daughter of a wealthy family and a notorious bastard that everyone disdained. But so what? Although Ye Zhuo was dealt a bad hand, she would still win.

Ye Zhuo quickly made room for the real daughter of the wealthy family and then helped her mother and uncle get rich overnight.

As an unparalleled talented woman, she became the head of a technology firm and had a fortune of hundreds of billions of dollars, directly reaching the pinnacle of her life! Meanwhile, she was having a relationship with a wealthy tycoon who always doted on her!

title: Grand Duke, I Can’t Do It Because It’s Too Cold in The North
Farming in Beast World: My Villainous Snake Cubs are Super Clingy
Legend of Star General
summary: A spinoff centering on Lu Bu Fengxian.

title: I Became the Contract Daughter of the soon-to-be-ruined Family
summary:
I thought I had regressed from this ragged life, but why has my time-limited life remained the same?
I'm ruined... is this how I should live my life...?

"This time, I'll get adopted by a normal family, and live in comfort for the rest of my life!"

Step by step, I'm going to take revenge against the one behind my death, and I'll protect what's left of my small and precious life!

However, did I put in too much effort?

"Anisha, you're perfect."

"I'm going to make this child a future professor."

All I wanted was to survive...

"Well, somehow, you’ve passed. I'll have to adopt this brat."

I ended up with a tycoon I didn't expect.
One whose household will be massacred in a few years!

How do I know that?
Me too! I didn't want to! Know that!

But what can I do? The milk has already been spilt.
I'll just live in bliss while acting as the real daughter during my 5 years contract, then I'll leave!

However...

"...I happened to pick this up on the way home."
"Father, you're the best!"
"I know."

...Something's wrong.

"I checked this out 'myself', and inspected it 'in person'. There's nothing to be grateful for."
"Father, you're a genius!"
"I know this too."

No, well, something's REALLY wrong.

**

I became fond of this unique and strange family, but...

"The five years contract we signed,"
"Let's nullify it."

While looking straight into my eyes, dad announced the termination.

"I can help you, but you'll still die anyway."

Not only that,
But death came under my nose too.

Will I be able to survive?

title: I Got A Job At A Haunted Mansion
The Symbiotic Relationship Between the Rabbit and the Black Panther
summary:
I was a rabbit shapeshifter who couldn't even transform into a human by my coming of age ceremony. My family said that I was just a halfling and placed me in a basket…

"You're crying? Go on, cry more."

Then I was then picked up by a black panther with an awful personality.

"You're lacking in fighting spirit. I'll eat you the day after tomorrow, so keep trying."

This fierce beast. Staring at my trembling face, the black panther's eyes glistened.

"How thrilling."

Mom, I think he's crazy! To survive a fairly crazy black panther.

"The wild beasts are possessive, no matter what it is."

…Is it possible?

---
Vivi is a... wererabbit?! As a creature that’s supposed to transform into a human, Vivi is a failure, demonized as cursed and sent off to her doom. Luckily, her demise is cut short as Ahin of the Black Leopard Clan saves her. But with every threat and command this temperamental heir tosses at Vivi, she’s questioning her safety (and sanity). Surrounded by carnivores and their strong pheromones, she'll try to survive the chaos while stuck in her rabbit form. Will she figure out how to transform and tap into the power within her cute, furry self?

title: Magic Emperor
summary:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: We Lost Our Engagement
summary: The story is set on one day during summer vacation. It follows a group of boys who try to view a fireworks display from the town lighthouse to see if they look round or flat when viewed from the side. Meanwhile, one of the boys, Norimichi, receives an invitation from his crush Nazuna to run away with her.

title: I’m A Super Rich Man, So It’s Reasonable For Me To Be A Scumbag
summary: Jiang Cheng woke up and was reborn! He was also bound to the Godly Rich System. Every second the world runs, he can get money! As the system continues to upgrade, Jiang Cheng's wealth has skyrocketed. All the cool school beauties and queen bosses are around him. Jiang Cheng laughed up to the sky. In his previous life, he was trapped by the things that he couldn't get when he was young for so long. Now that he is reborn, who cares about those broken rules! Let's drink and enjoy it first.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Madam and Her Daily Online Face-Slapping
summary: The Gu family, the leader of the Jijing Continent, was plotted against, and the family was separated. The head of the young family, Gu Mang, took her younger brother, Gu Si, disguising themselves, to regain power, beat the villain, avenge the family, gain glory, and pick up the top handsome president along the way.

title: Pyeonghwa Restaurant
summary: Chef Sua, with her unrivaled culinary skills, doesn't just rule over Peace Restaurant, Seoul's most peculiar eatery -- she weaves harmony between cosmic enemies now seated as tablemates. The tension in her restaurant simmers not from culinary rivalry but from the precarious peace among patrons from warring dimensions. Will Sua's culinary diplomacy be enough to maintain this balance, or is her restaurant destined to become the epicenter of an ultimate showdown?

title: Sovereign and Heartburn
summary: Aria’s world is thrown into chaos when Crown Prince Julius, the brilliant but insufferable royal she’s sworn to protect as Captain of his Guard, announces her as his future bride. Stunned, Aria confronts him, and Julius offers a way out: if she can defeat him in any competition before the wedding in six months, he’ll cancel the engagement. But with Julius’ unmatched skills, winning won’t be easy. Can Aria outsmart the talented prince and reclaim her life?

title: Before I knew it, I had stolen the Dark Lord’s Heart
summary:
Seeing the relationship between Duke Willow, the Sword of the North, and her father who's his guardian knight, Celine has been looking forward to meeting her lord, Damian. However, the Damian she encountered was a skinny, frail boy with a bright smile that belied his Northern Majesty. To fulfil her duty as a guardian knight, she decided to take her lord's side, no matter what kind of person he was. But there's something fishy about this frail boy...

---
Ten-year-old Celine Mars dreams of becoming a great knight escort just like her father. She’s set to serve under Damien Willow, the heir of a powerful Duke. There’s only one problem—he’s a total weakling, or so she thinks. Celine vows to train the poor, defenseless Damien to stand up for himself, completely unaware of his real strength. Meanwhile, Damien instantly takes a liking to Celine, finding her cluelessness and pure intentions both amusing and endearing. When will Celine finally realize she’s got the wrong idea about Damien?

title: Transmigrating to the Otherworld Once More
summary:
When the King’s Heart burns down, a being that transcends the fate of this world will arrive on this land!

The boy from Earth, Sung Sihan, brought down a tyrant and saved the world.

However, his happy ending was cut short when everything was taken away from him, and he was banished back to Earth.

After 10 years of gritting his teeth, he prepares for his return…

The hero who has already saved the world once re-enters Terranora!

title: The Scent That Binds Us
summary:
1945, Ueno. The souls of those that lost everything burst at the ruins left by the war.  
  
Kanekichi, a war orphan who lost his family continues to struggle in despair.  
But upon meeting a mysterious young man, Kanaida, the boy's heart starts unraveling …?

title: Odalisque
summary:
The Asmanskaya Empire is ruled by the one and only Emperor (Sultan) Suleiman.
Within his harem, female slaves live burdened with complex emotions.
There is Hürrem, who won the Emperor’s favor through fierce competition.
Some long for the honor of sharing his bed—others dread it.
Some silently endure the shame of humiliation.

And Mahasti… drowns in a forbidden love with a eunuch.

Author [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Raku_ichikawa)

title: The Teacher of the Nobles’ Kindergarten Is Having a Hard Day Again
I’m a Villainess, but I Won’t Live Like One
summary:
Bianca is just another noble lady with a simple dream: to marry into a duchy and enjoy a life of luxury.

But everything changes when she stumbles upon a book—one that casts her as the villainess, doomed to stand in the way of her real-life fiancé’s love story with a commoner girl. As Bianca realizes the book accurately depicts her own fate, she refuses to accept her tragic ending.

Can she rewrite her story, or is she simply destined to become a villainess?

title: In the Spring Shadow
summary:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.

title: Demon King
summary:
Mei, the daughter of a family that exterminates vicious monsters, was raised in a cold environment, lacking the power to exorcise demons. Meanwhile, her arrogant younger brother violates a taboo and awakens Ryouga, the king of another world! Mei is left behind... Mei is in danger, but Ryouga is actually a gentle, intelligent, and handsome young man. He teaches her the value of the rare "healing power" she possesses, and invites her to "become my princess."

(Source: Comic Walker, translated)

title: Lover Of Green Midnight
summary: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.

title: World’s Strongest Troll
summary:
Arcadia.
The game that holds the most possibilities in the world.
Humanity’s first virtual reality game, made from the cooperation between the world’s leading companies:
Ajin Electronics. Sillicoff Industries. Argos Corporation.
The shocking stories that happen within the game begin now!

[Welcome to Arcadia, the world of fantasy.]

title: I Thought I Didn’t Have Long To Live!
summary:
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanchett, was told she only had three months left to live. She decided that she didn't want to go quietly, so she decided to create and complete her bucket list! 

1. Treat her maid Anne to cakes
2. Gain independence and wealth
3. Get rid of her fiancé, the Marquis of Secreb
4. Date someone handsome for three months
5. Take a trip to the West!

...But it was only after she ran away that she realised... the fact her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanche, was diagnosed with a terminal illness and three months left to live. She decided to try to achieve her bucket list since she was going to die anyway. First, dumping an older fiancé whom she doesn't even love. Second, dating the monster Duke of Candel for three months! But it was only after she ran away from him that she realized, the fact that her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=825581), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4502291)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9021824), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801711)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/haiyiwieshijuezheng/list?title_no=2313)

title: Lantern Of The Dawn
summary: While you were admiring the girl in the next seat, she might be eyeing you up, too…? A new kind of “neighborly” short-form pure love comedy!

title: Absolute Dominion
summary: Twenty years have passed since the Great War, but petty theft and exploitation have taken root during times of peace. The once dazzling world of Murim is a mere shadow of its former self, but one young enigmatic swordsman has sworn to restore Jianghu to its former glory. Will the noble principles of justice and loyalty prevail over corruption and greed?

title: Prison Guard Zero
summary:
Ji-hun, a former member of a secret special forces unit under the Special Operations Planning Office of the South Korean Army Headquarters, returns from a long overseas deployment — only to receive the news that his younger sister Ji-yun has died, and that the person accused of killing her is none other than her boyfriend, Seo Min-jun.

While still struggling to accept the fact that his sister is gone, Ji-hun, who trusted Min-jun, learns that Min-jun was falsely accused and had gone to Yeokseon Prison in search of Ji-yun’s real killer.

But eventually, Min-jun also meets his death inside the prison.

Determined to uncover the truth behind the unjust deaths of both Ji-yun and Min-jun, Ji-hun becomes a prison guard and heads to Yeokseon Prison to uncover the secrets hidden within.

title: The Silent Sacrifice Princess And The Black Dragons Marriage
summary:
Ayame, born into a family of priestesses blessed by the Black Dragon God, possesses a unique ability to heal people through her voice. However, after the death of her parents, she is taken in by her uncle's family who mistreat her, leading to the loss of her voice. Her cousin Mari even takes over Ayame’s rightful position as priestess, and Ayame is eventually offered as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon.

"Why must I be killed like this?! Someone, please help me!"

Her desperate plea brought forth the Black Dragon from the sky. He descends and transforms into a handsome young man, gently takes Ayame's hand, and flies away with her.

Thus begins Ayame’s new life as the bride of Saku, the Black Dragon, living in his mansion situated between the celestial and human worlds. However, Ayame’s cousin Mari, envious of her new status as the beautiful bride of the Black Dragon schemes to steal him away...

A Japanese-style Cinderella story of a gentle-hearted girl who lost her voice and a proud yet compassionate Black Dragon.

---
The Kozuki family was granted the Black Dragon's blessing, allowing them to heal the sick and purify impurity with their voices alone. But Ayame's life shatters after her parents' death, leaving her at the mercy of her cruel aunt and uncle, who tortured her until she lost her voice. As their daughter, Mari, rises to become the new priestess, Ayame is offered as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon.

"Why do I have to die like this? Please help me!"

In response to her desperate plea, the Black Dragon appears as a striking man and takes her hand, whisking her away to his realm. Chosen to be the bride of the Black Dragon Saku, Ayame finds herself in the enchanting Black Dragon Manor, suspended between the heavens and the human world. But jealousy ignites in Mari, who vows to reclaim Saku and make Ayame suffer once more.

title: Locked to Death
summary: “Hye-seong,” a boy living on a remote island, meets “Yoon-hae,” a mermaid he met in the sea, and they become each other’s only friends. However, the two soon break up against each other due to Hye-seong’s move. Six years later, Yunhae gains mysterious abilities and returns to Comet. However, many things have changed for Hyesung to spend all his time with Yunhae like he did when he was young. “I’m a different person than you, Yoonhae.” Yoon Hae's attachment to the comet is slowly spreading into control... The winner of the 2nd largest contest on earth in 2022.

title: Like A Wind On A Dry Branch
summary:
Count Casarius fell victim to a plague and died suddenly, leaving behind a will stating that Rietta, a beautiful young widow of the manor, whom he tried to use as a concubine, be buried alive alongside him. Just before Rietta is buried, Archduke Axias, rumored to be a cruel tyrant, arrives at the funeral to collect the enormous debt Count Casarius still owes him.

"Everyone here seems to feel sorry for her, and I still have a debt to collect from Casarius… If I take her instead, I think all of you here should be happy," he smiled, "Hello, my temptress."

---
As plague and turmoil afflicts the empire, enchanting widow Rieta Tristi finds herself at the mercy of a malicious nobleman and his dying wish to have her buried alive beside his corpse. The plague has taken her husband, slave traders have taken her young child, and now her own life is at risk -- until an unexpected visit from the empire's outcast prince changes everything.

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=676625), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=2987280), [Yonder (English)](https://www.yonderstory.com/)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5489043), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=748535&weekday=wed)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2405)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/feihuangzideshenmiqingren/list?title_no=1566)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/likeawind/list?title_no=2272)
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2572)
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2585)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/cursed-blessing/list?title_no=2298)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001066)
* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/fantasy/like-wind-on-a-dry-branch/list?title_no=2682)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/cursed-blessing/list?title_no=2330)

title: Flowers That Bloom at Night
summary: Kasumi, a serious girl who has just started at an all-girls school, discovers a letter tucked into an old book she found in the library. The letter's writer yearns to have a special relationship with another girl, like how it was described in the book… A romance about the the old-school "S" kind of girls-love.

title: Overlord of Insects
summary: Having been transported into a world where everyone is a Job-Changer, Jiang Chen awakened the Insect Domination System! The little insects can evolve, attack, and extract talents! Most importantly, they can breed invincible natural disasters!

title: Dao of the Bizarre Immortal
summary: Li Nianfan transmigrated to an immortal cultivation world as a mortal. Knowing that he could never become a cultivator, he decided to live an ordinary life. But unbeknownst to him, his dog became a mighty Yaoguai king by watching him draw and write; the tree he planted in the backyard became the tree of the world by listening to tunes he played; a passerby he met, who gained enlightenment from the chitchat with him, became a Taoist sage and started a new era...

title: To Julie
summary: Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

title: Princess Sveta’s Political Marriage
summary:
Princess Fairis, reincarnated into the world of strategy simulation games, uses her knowledge of the games she played in her previous life and is called the Warrior Princess. However, as soon as the war ends, she is ordered by the king to marry. In addition, she competes with her sister in arranged marriages and, depending on her partner, cannot get involved in national politics. ...I want to build my country, not get married! As she struggles to arrange a political marriage that will give her more territory, Orpheed, a wizard who is also her trusted subordinate and a potential bride, unexpectedly confesses his love for her...?

A love comedy between a reincarnated princess with zero love skills and the strongest wizard with an intense love.

title: Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

title: Hoping for My Death
summary:
In pursuit of a natural death, Silvia reluctantly agrees to a strategic marriage. To deceive the gods, she must convincingly play the role of a married couple.

"Shall we turn off the lights then?"
"Why would we...?"
"Don't we have to consummate our marriage on the first night?"
"Why is that necessary?"

Isn't my husband too conservative?

Silvia, who yearns for a chance to die, and Randal, who struggles with conflicting emotions, embark on an unexpected healing romance.

title: Hades & Persephone
summary: This series including fanfic short stories about the famous couple in Greek mythology- Hades and Persephone and some other couples as well.

title: Sorang’s Flower Art Shop
summary:
1. KAZAMI YU×ARI ver  
Yuuka decides to pay a "surprise night visit" to Alice, and sneaks into her house with the help of Wriggle.  
  
2. KAZAMI Aki Sisters Ver.  
The Aki sister fall victim of Yuuka’s flower shop scam, and have to enlist help for a rather aggressive response.  
  
3. KAZAMI MADMAX ver.  
Yuuka the berserker pays a friendly visit to her dear Alice's café. No really, it's a friendly visit, I swear, don't get troubled by the army of goons tagging along. Or the guns. Or the trenches they dug overnight.  
  
4. KAZAMI FULL METAL JACKET. ver.

title: Don’t Pay Attention to The Villainess
How to Turn a Gentle Male Lead Into an Obsessive Male Lead
